name: Swords and Sandals Classic Collection
description: "Gladiator ... gladiator ... gladiator ... Swords and Sandals, Gladiatorrrrr!"If this refrain means anything to you, then you grew up playing the legendary Swords and Sandals turn based combat game series. These games have been played over half a billion times, and for good reason.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 500MHZ Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 10 Processor: 500MHZ Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 200 MB available space
